abstract: After loudly protesting their dismissal from Dow Chemical a year ago, a former executive and a former director of the chemical giant have admitted that they took part in unauthorized talks about a potential sale of the company while the leveraged buyout boom was still in full swing.
lead_paragraph: After loudly protesting their dismissal from Dow Chemical a year ago, a former executive and a former director of the chemical giant have admitted that they took part in unauthorized talks about a potential sale of the company while the leveraged buyout boom was still in full swing.

headline.main: Ex-Dow Executives Admit to Unauthorized Buyout Talks
